text: Namma Ooru Raasa (Tamil: நம்ம ஊரு ராசா) is a 1996 Indian Tamil film, directed by Ramarajan and produced by Nalini Ramarajan. The film stars Ramarajan, Sangita, Manivannan and Senthil in lead roles. The film had musical score by Sirpy. ==Cast== *Ramarajan *Sangita *Vadivelu *Charle *Ponnambalam *R. P. Viswam *Shanmugasundaram *Ponvannan *Ganthimathi *Sathyapriya *Halwa Vasu ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Sirpy. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Lyrics !!
